line.comment: * We are still hired, let's protect someone else.
* when too many Nomad mercs exist (ZH.Core), about 2/3 of them will commit suicide in Xenon territory
* but usually they just travel the galaxy
* Nomads always need to move to another faction and at a minimum distance of 5 jumps

sval.val: We are still hired, let's protect someone else.
when too many Nomad mercs exist (ZH.Core), about 2/3 of them will commit suicide in Xenon territory
but usually they just travel the galaxy
Nomads always need to move to another faction and at a minimum distance of 5 jumps
